items.name: 6 Brockley Bottles
items.desc:
Brockley Brewery six pack of bottles now available for only £12.00!
Choose your selection from a wide variety of brews; Pale Ale, Red Ale, Lager, Porter, Altbier and Session IPA. Please add your choice to the NOTES box at checkout.
This offer is available for local delivery to South East London postcodes and Collection Only. Please do not order this for UK wide delivery.
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
SE4, SE12, SE13 - Free Same Day Delivery
Remaining SE London Postcodes - £3 Same Day Delivery
NW, NE, SW London Postcodes - £6 Delivery on Fridays
UK wide - £5 delivery 5 - 7 working days
COLLECTION OPTION:
Save on the delivery fee by collecting from our Hither Green Site. You may collect your beer on the same-day if you order by 11am. Collections take place from 10am-1pm, 7 days a week. If you order after 11am your beer will be ready for collection the next day.
Please make sure you select 'Collection: Hither Green Taproom' if you wish to collect.

items.name: Altbier
items.desc:
Altbier 5L Mini Keg
In celebration of Oktoberfest we’ve brewed up a very special beer to mark the occasion and since lockdown 2.0 we've decided to add it to our mini keg range!
Altbier (meaning “Old Beer”) is a traditional German precursor to Lager, historically hailing from the city of Düsseldorf. Whilst it matures in tank for longer than most other ales, unlike a Lager, Altbier is top-fermented and has a richer, maltier profile with a darker colour to match. 4.5%
Product FAQ
Delivery Options

Remaining SE London Postcodes - £3 Same Day Delivery

UK wide - £5 delivery 5 - 7 working days

items.name: Brockley Brewery Christmas Card
items.desc:
This year we are funraising for Crisis throughout Christmas, these cards come in packs of 5 for £5 and all proceeds go to Crisis.
This pack does not include envelopes.

items.name: Curiously Catford
items.desc:
Curiously Catford IPA 5L Mini Keg
For the last year or so, we've been delighted to be working closely with the team at The Catford Bridge Tavern, a stone's throw away from Brockly at the bustling heart of Catford, brewing their very own Curiously Catford IPA (4.5% ABV). This beer started out life as a special brew for their annual Catford Beer Festival and quickly became a permanent fixture on their bar in subsequent months.
Our Curiously Catford IPA packs a tangy citrus punch, with refreshing summertime flavours of orange and clementine, together with a subtle spicy undertone. Since Lockdown 2.0 came into effect we deiced to treat you all and turn it into mini kegs, enjoy!
Product FAQ
Delivery Options

items.name: Extra Citrus IPA In 2 Or 4 Pint Cartons Or Bag In Box
items.desc:
Red Ale in 2 or 4 Pint Cartons
Our Red Ale is a full-bodied, full-flavoured and deliciously balanced beer. Roasted European malts deepen its hue, turning the ale a deep ruby tone, whilst adding to its rich malty character. This is balanced by American hops for a bold, satisfying bitterness. 4.8% ABV.
Product FAQ

items.name: Pale Ale In 2 Or 4 Pint Cartons
items.desc:
Pale Ale in 2 or 4 Pint Cartons
This Pale Ale was our first ever beer and it's so popular we've been brewing it since 2013! Over time we have refined our recipe so it's more spectatular then ever.
A full-bodied malt driven Pale Ale. Bittered with a combination of British hops giving an initial bittersweet taste followed by hints of apricot, leading to a satisfying finish. At 4.1% ABV you can drink this for days.

items.name: Porter In 2 Or 4 Pint Carton
items.desc:
Porter in 2 or 4 Pint Carton
Our hearty, warming Porter derives it's deep dark colour from a combination of roasted malts, disguises an intricate and subtle mingling of rich coffee and bittersweet chocolate notes, coupled with a distinct smokey flavour. Classic, complex, malty and robust. 4.3% ABV.

items.name: Unfiltered Lager
items.desc:
Unfiltered Lager 5L Mini Keg
Steeped in time-honoured German heritage, our crisp, refreshing Lager is now available unfiltered for maximum flavour. Time-matured and traditionally brewed using Pilsner malts and Noble Hersbrucker hops, this wonderfully hazy Lager has a pleasant hint of citrus with fresh, grassy notes. 4.1% ABV.

items.name: Winter Gold In 2 Or 4 Pint Cartons
items.desc:
Winter Gold in 2 or 4 Pint Cartons
Our fantastic Winter Gold was so incredibly popular last year that we've given in to demand and brewed it again.
Brewed with hearty oats and rich, biscuity malts, this elegant golden ale is silky and sumptuous and the perfect addition to any fireside.
A charming medley of British hops (including Bullion, Challenger, Admiral, and Goldings) combine to give this beer it's festive glow; imparting warm, zesty undertones, spicy cedar notes and hints of festive redcurrant.
At 4.3% ABV it's highly sessionable and ideal for cosying up with throughout winter.
